text: Dang you ren xiang tamen songdu wo de mingbai de qishi shi, bu xinyang zhe [gu lai shen ren zhongguo shechi shenghuo de duoshenjiao tu] dui xinshi [mu sheng de zhuisui zhe zhongguo jianku shenghuo zhe] shuo:“Liang pai [xinshi yu bu xinyang zhe] zhong na yipai di diwei zuigao, xieshang changmian zui hongda ne?”
